datoCmsEvent.title: Monthly Workshop Series: Rock the Audition with Sheri Sanders

children.value:
Get ready to Rock the Audition with Sheri Sanders!
In 2004, Sheri Sanders noticed that the radio was changing the climate of musical theatre. She has since become the world’s preeminent Popular Music Repertoire Coach and, in 2015, turned her hugely successful book, Rock the Audition: How to Prepare for and Get Cast in Rock Musicals, into an interactive online training program. Besides training performers and educators from every corner of the world, she has teamed up with Musicnotes.com to create custom audition cuts in all styles of Popular Music and Musical Theatre!                  Workshop Description:There are eight performer spots - this is first come first serve! If you don’t get a performer spot, or if singing isn’t your thing, please feel free to audit!
